name: Die Adventure
description:
Search way to die as you progress from modern era to dinosaur era

This game is made for Code Block Game Jam

Game Hint

level 1:make sure the computer can kill you

level 2:make the mafia trust you by giving a good thing on his birthday and dont lie

level 3:make him see a different person sight

level 4:dino hate boring person and without dino the forest will kill you
